channel.title: Send message help
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I am using a devolution 7.0 server source and i am currently making full wokring barrows. I want to make it so barrows drop keys and to enter the tunnel you need all 6 keys, but when you dont have all the keys it doesn't send the message it should, it doesn't send a message at all.

item.title: Send message help
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

I am using a devolution 7.0 server source and i am currently making full wokring barrows. I want to make it so barrows drop keys and to enter the tunnel you need all 6 keys. But when you enter the crypt i want it to rmeove the items and this isn’t working:

if (objectID == 6726) { if (playerHasItem(300)) if (playerHasItem(300)) if (playerHasItem(300)) if (playerHasItem(300)) if (playerHasItem(300)) { deleteItem(300); deleteItem(300); deleteItem(300); deleteItem(300); deleteItem(300); teleportToX = 3535; teleportToY = 9700; } else { sendMessage("You need 5 rat tails to enter!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Send message help
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

if (objectID == 6773) && (playerHasItem(2399)) && (playerHasItem(2400)) && (playerHasItem(2411)) && (playerHasItem(2832)) && (playerHasItem(2834)) && (playerHasItem(2401)) { teleportToX = 3534; teleportToY = 9712; heightLevel = 0; } else { sendMessage("Get all 6 barrows keys to enter!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Send message help
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Take the last } off?
